general.query: Summarize the key findings from all documents
general.description: Get a high-level overview of document contents

general.query: What are the main themes discussed across the documents?
List all important dates mentioned in the documents
What recommendations are provided in the documents?

doctor.query: What is the patient's medical history and current medications?
Identify any potential drug interactions or contraindications
What are the reported symptoms and their timeline?

lawyer.query: Find all precedents related to breach of contract in healthcare
lawyer.description: Legal research for specific case type

lawyer.query: What are the key legal arguments presented in these cases?
What damages were awarded in similar cases?

hr.query: Compare the 2022 and 2024 travel policies and highlight changes
What are the current compliance requirements for remote work?
List all employee benefits and eligibility criteria
What is the disciplinary process outlined in the handbook?

sample_datasets.name: medical-records-2024
sample_datasets.description: Patient medical records and clinical notes
